meanings.definition: Behavior involving physical force intended to hurt, damage, or kill someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The violence in the movie was so intense that it made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent2: Domestic violence is a serious issue that affects many families.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's exaggerated violence towards the villain always made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The violence of the storm shook the entire town with its fierce winds and heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The violence of the explosion left a trail of destruction in its wake.

meanings.definition: Strength of emotion or an unpleasant or destructive natural force.
meanings.sent1: The violence of her anger was evident in the way she slammed the door.
meanings.sent2: The violence of the ocean waves crashing against the rocks was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The violence of the spicy chili made his taste buds tingle with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The violence of the wildfire spread rapidly through the dry forest.
meanings.sent5: The violence of the thunderstorm echoed through the valley, shaking the windows.
